translations.name: King James Version (1769)
translations.source: CrossWire SWORD module KJV or your existing KJV JSON
translations.edition_note: English side assumed by the mapping PDF.

translations.name: Russian Synodal (Synodal tradition, includes 2Cor 11:33)
translations.source: CrossWire SWORD module in the Synodal tradition (e.g., RST/RusSynodal)
translations.edition_note: Matches RUSV/RST numbering evidenced by Jonah 1:17→2:1, Dan 3:31–33, Song 7:1, Rom 14:24–26, 2Cor 11:33.
